content: knit first stitch on lefthand needle through front of loop and take both stitches off lefthand needle 2 © ammonite yarns 2025 chart symbols all sizes twisted stitch pattern the twisted stitch pattern forms an eight stitch twelve row repeat and is shown in this partial chart 3 © ammonite yarns 2025 instructions brim using 5 5mm needles cast on 50 58 66 74 st row 1 k2 p2 to last 2 st k2 row 2 p2 k2 to last 2 st p2 repeat row 1 and 2 three more times 8 row worked in total body of hat change to 6 0mm needles commence chart a b c d starting at row 1 and repeating the section outlined in red 3 3 4 4 times across the hat read right side row from right to left and wrong side row from left to right work the chart once vertically making the decreases for the crown shaping as indicated the decreases are positioned with the twisted stitches to maintain the flow of the pattern finishing cut yarn leaving a 50cm long tail for sewing thread yarn through remaining 4 4 4 5 stitches and pull up snugly to close the top of the hat thread yarn through the stitches again and then use the tail to sew the two edges of the hat together with mattress stitch working one stitch in from each edge to maintain pattern across the seam darn in ends wash hat gently pat to shape and lay flat to dry 4 © ammonite yarns 2025 chart a size xs small child 5 © ammonite yarns 2025 chart b size s older child/teen 6 © ammonite yarns 2025 chart c size m adult 7 © ammonite yarns 2025 chart d size l large adult 8 © ammonite yarns 2025
